channel.title: The $100 MBA Show – Daily 10-Minute Business Lessons | Online Business | Entrepreneurship | Marketing
channel.description: A new kind of podcast where you simply get better at business with our daily 10 minute business lessons for the real world.
channel.itunes:summary:
The $100 MBA Show is a new kind of podcast where you simply get better at business with our daily 10 minute business lessons for the real world. These no fluff, 10-minute episodes are packed with only the pure business building training you want.
Omar Zenhom shares some of the best lessons, concepts, examples and insights from inside The $100 MBA training and community. Omar also calls upon some of the industry's top experts as guest teachers on the show. Again, no backstories or promotions, just solid business lessons from the best in the game.
We get it. You love business podcasts just as much as the next person but you just can’t take another wasted hour of fluff and ‘discussion’. This is where The $100 MBA Show comes in! Just straight-up, valuable business building training.
Life is busy, we know. But we also know you need to always be growing as a business builder. That’s why all our episodes are about 10 minutes or less and subscribers get a fresh episode everyday, Monday to Friday. Very cool.
channel.itunes:author: The $100 MBA - Daily 10-minute lessons in business, entrepreneurship, sales, marketing, finance, branding and a whole lot more.

item.title: MBA11 Why Build a Service Based Business
item.dc:creator: Omar Zenhom
item.description:
Building a service based business is quite different from a product based one. So why would you want to start on? What should one expect and is it right for you? Let’s get into it!     Stitcher | SoundCloud | Podcast Feed | How To Subscribe

item.title: MBA07 Relationships to Build in Business
item.dc:creator: Nicole Baldinu
item.description:
In business you get to enjoy a ton of different relationships and it’s uber important that you know how to build, maintain and manage the various people you will be involved with. Business is about people and so having good relationships means having good business, right? Not rocket science but so many neglect some of […]

The post MBA07 Relationships to Build in Business appeared first on The $100 MBA.
item.content:encoded:
In business you get to enjoy a ton of different relationships and it’s uber important that you know how to build, maintain and manage the various people you will be involved with. Business is about people and so having good relationships means having good business, right? Not rocket science but so many neglect some of the fundamentals here. Listen up!

Another big shout-out to our wonderful and talented friend and music creative Matt Giovanisci of Listen, Money Matters. Matt created the cool track you hear on the show and we’re still dancing days into it. Check out Matt and his co-host Andrew Fiebert’s personal finance podcast, it’s not only great but it goes really well with what you’re learning here at The $100 MBA! Super!!

 

SUBSCRIBE ON ITUNES

 

Stitcher | SoundCloud | Podcast Feed | How To Subscribe

The post MBA07 Relationships to Build in Business appeared first on The $100 MBA.

item.title: MBA06 10 Ways To Evaluate Your Business Part 2
item.dc:creator: Nicole Baldinu
item.description:

The post MBA06 10 Ways To Evaluate Your Business Part 2 appeared first on The $100 MBA.
item.content:encoded:
The second and concluding part of a sure-fire way to evaluate if you have a viable business idea. We covered the first five ways to evaluate your business idea in MBA04. Are you ready to add up your points now for all 10 ways and see if your idea is worth a red hot go? Yeah!

item.title: MBA05 Guest Teacher: Justin Jackson – Words and Your Website
item.dc:creator: Nicole Baldinu
item.description:
Our first Guest Teacher on The $100 MBA Show is Justin Jackson. His lesson on Words and Your Website will have you hanging on every word. Really. He is so good! We are so thrilled to have him as the first teacher on the show and know that you will learn a lot in this […]

The post MBA05 Guest Teacher: Justin Jackson – Words and Your Website appeared first on The $100 MBA.
item.content:encoded:
Our first Guest Teacher on The $100 MBA Show is Justin Jackson. His lesson on Words and Your Website will have you hanging on every word. Really. He is so good! We are so thrilled to have him as the first teacher on the show and know that you will learn a lot in this short and snappy lesson. Get into it!

 

Links Mentioned

http://justinjackson.ca/audiencecourse/

http://justinjackson.ca/newsletter/

http://pjrvs.com

http://pjrvs.com/signup

https://draftin.com

https://knowyourcompany.com

http://37signals.com

http://letsfreckle.com

 

Say thanks teach! @mijustin on Twitter

item.title: MBA04 10 Ways To Evaluate a Business – Part 1
item.dc:creator: Nicole Baldinu
item.description:
Get ready to do an exercise that will show you if your business is viable, if there is a need for it and if there is potential for your business to thrive in the market. This is Part 1 of a large lesson that takes you through 10 ways to evaluate your business idea. Omar […]

The post MBA04 10 Ways To Evaluate a Business – Part 1 appeared first on The $100 MBA.
item.content:encoded:
Get ready to do an exercise that will show you if your business is viable, if there is a need for it and if there is potential for your business to thrive in the market. This is Part 1 of a large lesson that takes you through 10 ways to evaluate your business idea. Omar guides you in how to score each way and then how to add all your points up at end of Part 2 to get your final score. Get excited!

 

SUBSCRIBE ON ITUNES

 

Stitcher | SoundCloud | Podcast Feed | How To Subscribe

The post MBA04 10 Ways To Evaluate a Business – Part 1 appeared first on The $100 MBA.

item.title: MBA01 What is a business anyway?
item.dc:creator: Omar Zenhom
item.description:
How do you know you have an actual business on your hands? In this first episode of The $100 MBA Show you will learn what makes up a business anyway. What are the 5 parts you need in order to have a business on your hands. Let’s get down to business…     A big […]

The post MBA01 What is a business anyway? appeared first on The $100 MBA.
item.content:encoded:
How do you know you have an actual business on your hands? In this first episode of The $100 MBA Show you will learn what makes up a business anyway. What are the 5 parts you need in order to have a business on your hands. Let’s get down to business…

 

 

A big shout out and thanks to Matt Giovanisci from Listen, Money Matters. He created the super funky track that you hear on the show and we think it rocks!
